bug.author: LowSkillDeveloper
bug.description: Need to add "firmware-ralink" package, to be able to work with all ralink adapters.

comments.comment: Also, as I understand it. You have banned updating firmware for firmware-atheros firmware-brcm8021 firmware-misc-nonfree firmware-realtek. I think for this package will also need to be do this.
Which version of the package works for you?
firmware-ralink is a dummy package and contains just changelog files^^
